description: Iced corn with milk, a classic Filipino treat consisting of layers of corn kernels, shaved ice, milk, and assorted toppings.
ingredient: [{"name": "Ice cubes", "units": "cups", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "Corn kernels", "units": "cups", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "Milk", "units": "cups", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "Granulated sugar", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "Optional toppings", "units": null, "amount": null}]
step_by_step: 1. Shave the ice cubes using a shaved ice maker or crush them in a blender. 2. Add 1/2 cup corn kernels to each of four parfait glasses. 3. Add about 1/2 cup of shaved or crushed ice on top of the corn. 4. Sprinkle 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar per glass over the ice. 5. Pour 1/2 cup of milk into each glass. 6. Add toppings as desired. 7. Serve immediately.
notes: Use fresh corn for the best flavor; optional toppings can include vanilla ice cream or Rice Krispies.
